Container.Name: esphome

Branch.TagDescription: Latest ESPHome release with an Alpine Base.
Latest ESPHome release with an Ubuntu base.

Container.Overview: ESPHome is a system to control your ESP8266/ESP32 by simple yet powerful configuration files and control them remotely through Home Automation systems.
Container.Changes:
### 2023-04-14 - switch to gcompat
### 2023-03-21 - Add service checks
### 2023-01-20 - Add aarch64 support.
### 2023-01-02 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: ESPHOME_DASHBOARD_USE_PING
Config.Description: Use ping rather than mDNS to get device status, set to `true` if devices are appearing offline

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for newly created files. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
